definitions.definition: The condition of having more than one spouse or marriage partner at one time.
examples: Are there countries where polygamy is legal for both men and women?

definitions.definition: Synonym of polygyny ( “ marriage of a man to more than one wife, the practice of having several wives at the same time ” ) .
examples: Though Islam allows polygamy , it is frowned upon in many contemporary Muslim societies.

definitions.definition: The state or habit of having more than one sexual mate .
examples: An insect queen actually practices polygamy only one day, while for an alpha-male defending his harem is the very essence of both his status and polygamy .

definitions.definition: The condition or state of a plant which bears both perfect and unisexual flowers.

main_definition: The condition of having more than one spouse or marriage partner at one time.
secondary_definitions: ( often, especially in common use ) Synonym of polygyny ( “ marriage of a man to more than one wife, the practice of having several wives at the same time ” ) .
( zoology ) The state or habit of having more than one sexual mate .
( botany ) The condition or state of a plant which bears both perfect and unisexual flowers.
